meanings.definition: The process of organic matter decomposing into humus.
meanings.sent1: Humification is important for creating nutrient-rich soil.
meanings.sent2: Gardening enthusiasts study humification to improve their composting techniques.
meanings.sent3: The worms in the compost bin had a humification party last night!
meanings.sent4: In the garden, humification works like a magical transformation from waste to treasure.
meanings.sent5: The smell of humification in the soil reminded her of the cycle of life and growth.

meanings.definition: The transformation of plant and animal remains into a dark, organic substance.
meanings.sent1: After a few weeks, the humification of the leaves turned them into rich soil.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use humification to recycle organic matter back into the earth.
meanings.sent3: The kids were amazed by the humification process happening in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The forest floor showed signs of humification, with decaying leaves turning into humus.
meanings.sent5: The power of humification to turn waste into valuable nutrients is truly remarkable.
